title: Biliary NF-κB-Inducing Kinase Promotes Ductular Reaction, Inflammation, and Fibrosis and Impedes Liver Disease Resolution.
abstract: NF-κB-inducing kinase (NIK) is selectively upregulated in cholangiocytes during chronic liver disease, but its role in disease progression is poorly understood. We here show that cholangiocyte-specific overexpression of NIK (NIK
